feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.9.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Capture codegen accept/reject events in PostHog. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15954
  • Hide Day Passes by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15958
  • Further UX updates for the AI JS generation by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15959
  • Remove LLM options that aren't OpenAI. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15960
  • Typing of AI Configuration files by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15961
  • Show AI JS prompt in expanded state when in drawer by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15966
  • Binding fixes by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15962
  • Fix issue with square brackets in readable bindings by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15972
  • Revert "Remove LLM options that aren't OpenAI." by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15973
  • Support LLM formats and structured outputs by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15968
  • AI table generation UI by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15975
  • Bump next from 14.2.25 to 14.2.26 in /examples/nextjs-api-sales by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15870
  • Bump vite from 4.5.3 to 4.5.13 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15943
  • Prefer get account by tenantId by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15991
  • Safari fixes by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15989
  • Need to match the account email by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15994

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.9.1...3.9.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.9.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Markdown performance improvements by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15987
  • Move creator edit access to premium by @ConorWebb96 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15995
  • Revert "Prefer get account by tenantId (#15991)" by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15998

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.9.2...3.9.3

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.9.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • AI tables generation by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15866
  • 15974 add missing plan to creator check by @ConorWebb96 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16005
  • AI frontend tweaks by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16004
  • Mark ai generated tables and columns by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16012
  • Don't swallow errors when serving apps by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16014

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.9.3...3.9.4

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.9.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix serving apps without themes due to defaulting a string to an object by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16017

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.9.4...3.9.5

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.10.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove the check for Feature.BUDIBASE_AI by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15955
  • Backend changes to support new AI settings page by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15979
  • Updates for AI Configuration screen by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15993
  • Update pro reference. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16022
  • Fix the way that the AI settings page finds AI configs for a given provider by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16024
  • Improve error message when running out of Budibase AI credits. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16030
  • Remove custom AI config quota tracking. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16023
  • Animate the BBAI logo when loading. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16032
  • AI JS styling fixes by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16033
  • Feature flag debug UI by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16010
  • Table generation speed improments by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16029
  • Check if license key exists on AI Config page by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16036
  • Fix for enabling BBAI on selfhost by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16037
  • Budibase AI UI tweaks based on feedback from product. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16038
  • Reload the auth store after making AI settings changes. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16039
  • Corrrectly evaluate AI suggestions by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16041
  • Fix AI settings page by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16043
  • Update copy for self-host Budibase AI flow. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16047
  • Show evaluation side panel on AI suggestion by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16044
  • Remove erroneous cast. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16050
  • Show disabled AI providers in cloud by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16051
  • Update pro reference. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16052
  • Allow anyone to make an AI column. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16053
  • Fix issue with AI table generation styling by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16056
  • Update pro reference. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16055
  • Don't default the OPENAI_API_KEY to an invalid value locally. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16054
  • Update pro reference. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16058
  • Update pro reference. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16059
  • Pull in latest pro changes. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16060
  • Pull in latest pro changes. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16061
  • Remove VerificationPromptBanner by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16046
  • Notify when a request to get a user fails by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16064
  • Add option to refresh all data providers by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16057
  • Typing builder screen components by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16045
  • Enable adding oauth2 config when none is yet created by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16070
  • Hide AI custom config quota. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16075
  • Inline filter component by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15977
  • Fix AI Config screen UI issue and add some tests by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16063
  • Fix issue where clicking icon was clearing ai prompt by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16076

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.9.5...3.10.0
